title: spyrosc200
author: spyrosc200
created_time: September 10, 2022, 08:47:48 AMLast edit: October 14, 2022, 10:20:33 AM by spyrosc200
content: I'm just giving the community a heads-up because gxgbet casino has all signs of an exit scam casinoScammers Profile Link:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3483670https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3484398Reference Link:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5402686.140Amount Scammed: 2094 eurosPayment Method: BitcoinsWhat happened is that new registrations are disabled, telegram group closed, OP haven't visited forum for more than a month.https://imgur.com/a/SZoqz9eMy 1k withdrawal is pending for 48h, they are not responding to messages and live chat is no longer available as well.https://imgur.com/a/V8imUfpWish i am wrong but Gxgbet casino has all the signs of an exit scam casino.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Exit scams don't usually disable new registrations as they want to get as many people in as possible.

comments.author: spyrosc200
comments.body: Quote from: alterra57 on September 10, 2022, 09:27:46 AMExit scams don't usually disable new registrations as they want to get as many people in as possible.Not true.I previously got scammed from casino2021bet few months ago which was also owned by SG International N.V (same company as Gxgbet) in the exact same way. They disable new registrations, stop responging to messages etc.''casino2021bet.com is operated by SG International N.V., which is registered in Dr. M.J. Hugenholtzweg 25 Unit 11, Curacao''''Gxgbet.com is operated by SG International N.V., which is registered in Dr. M.J. Hugenholtzweg 25 Unit 11, Curacao''Had post my complaint at LCB at that time as i used fiat to deposit at casino2021bet.https://lcb.org/onlinecasinobonusforum/direct-casino-support/casino2021bet/30Hope you are correct but 99% this is an exit scam.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: spyrosc200 on September 10, 2022, 08:47:48 AMI'm just giving the community a heads-up because gxgbet casino has all signs of an exit scam casinoScammers Profile Link:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3483670https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3484398Reference Link:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5402686.140Amount Scammed: 2094 eurosPayment Method: BitcoinsWhat happened is that new registrations are disabled, telegram group closed, OP haven't visited forum for more than a month.https://imgur.com/a/SZoqz9eMy 1k withdrawal is pending for 48h, they are not responding to messages and live chat is no longer available as well.https://imgur.com/a/V8imUfpWish i am wrong but Gxgbet casino has all the signs of an exit scam casino.The obvious sign is when they close the chat group when I was active in the ICO bounty campaign, projects that will do an exit scam, moderate their chat, ban members who are complaining then close it, there's no reason why they should close their chat group without giving a valid reason, I've checked the representative of GXGBet.com and its good that it is tagged already, you can create a flag for this casino, I doubt you'll get your withdrawal.

This scammer has created multiple duplicate sites with the same template.www.theluckycrypto.comwww.diceheroe.comwww.rost.bet

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Looks like an abandoned casino = scam, and both representing accounts have not logged in for a while. Tagging both accounts and flagging them tooSorry about your loss, but next time be very careful with brand-new casinos that even don't have enough numbers in terms of traffic and players.Flags1. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;flag=30292. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;flag=3028

comments.author: spyrosc200
comments.created_time: September 20, 2022, 07:11:12 PMLast edit: September 20, 2022, 07:21:49 PM by spyrosc200
comments.body: Two weeks after GXGBET dissappeared from forum with customers money, another casino under same management appeared on forum, Betcoco.com''Betcoco.com is operated by SG International N.V., which is registered in Dr. M.J. Hugenholtzweg 25 Unit 11, Curacao, registration No. 137028'''''Gxgbet.com is operated by SG International N.V., which is registered in Dr. M.J. Hugenholtzweg 25 Unit 11, Curacao''https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5414084.0Story will repeat itself, SG International N.V. are scammers, be careful!

comments.author: spyrosc200
comments.body: Can confirm that i finally got paid my 1744 euros.Thanks Gxgbet.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: spyrosc200 on October 13, 2022, 07:47:29 AMCan confirm that i finally got paid my 1744 euros.Thanks Gxgbet.Still, it's very annoying to see that title it's better to change that or just change the title to GXCCoin.io issue is solved just like what the other complainants did when their issues were solved, it's harming the casino if the title is still showing like that, many readers may overlook the solved word at the end of the title.

comments.author: Solosanz
comments.body: Quote from: spyrosc200 on October 13, 2022, 07:47:29 AMCan confirm that i finally got paid my 1744 euros.Thanks Gxgbet.Thanks to confirm this, I've changed my feedback to neutral since the accusation has been resolved.But waiting for 2 months without any reply from the representative will make anyone mad since they think there's no way the accusation will get resolved. Another thing the representative didn't even give a warning to everyone if they're want to shutdown their casino, I think GXGBet can't be trusted anymore. Everyone should stay away and there's a chance their coins will become shitcoins since they currently don't have gambling casino.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: spyrosc200 on October 13, 2022, 07:47:29 AMCan confirm that i finally got paid my 1744 euros.Thanks Gxgbet.You said they scammed you 2094 Euros, so what happened to the remaining 350 Euros?And where is proof that the issue was resolved?My flag and negative trust is staying on for now until I can confirm that the issue was indeed solved.

comments.author: spyrosc200
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on October 13, 2022, 11:44:13 AMQuote from: spyrosc200 on October 13, 2022, 07:47:29 AMCan confirm that i finally got paid my 1744 euros.Thanks Gxgbet.Still, it's very annoying to see that title it's better to change that or just change the title to GXCCoin.io issue is solved just like what the other complainants did when their issues were solved, it's harming the casino if the title is still showing like that, many readers may overlook the solved word at the end of the title. true this, tittle changed, thanks for pointing

comments.author: spyrosc200
comments.body: Quote from: logfiles on October 13, 2022, 09:44:16 PMQuote from: spyrosc200 on October 13, 2022, 07:47:29 AMCan confirm that i finally got paid my 1744 euros.Thanks Gxgbet.You said they scammed you 2094 Euros, so what happened to the remaining 350 Euros?And where is proof that the issue was resolved?My flag and negative trust is staying on for now until I can confirm that the issue was indeed solved.When i opened the scam accusation, balance was 2094 but some bets were unsettle. When games finished, new balance is 1744 which paid.https://imgur.com/a/i7JmKqMAs you can see, first attempts to withdraw were non successful. They kept ignoring me. At the end they requested KYC and they paid.Didn't expected it but can't complaint tbh
